titleStmt.title: The due way of composing the differences on foot, preserving the Church, / according to the opinion of Herbert Thorndike.
titleStmt.author: Thorndike, Herbert, 1598-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Warren, for John Martin, James Allestry, and Thomas Dicas, at the Bell in St. Paul's Church-yard.,
